Tabletop-Pull-Pivot-v1: pull the pivot to the target area
Tabletop-Pick-Pen-v1: pick up the pen and put it to the marker
Tabletop-Put-Ball-IntoContainer-v1: put the ball into the container
Tabletop-Rotate-Holder-v1: rotate the holder till the hole upward
Tabletop-Rotate-Cube-v1: rotate the cube till the blue face upward
Tabletop-Pick-Book-FromShelf-v1: Find and pick the book from the bookshelf and put it on the marker
Tabletop-Pick-Bottle-v1: pick up the bottle and put it on the marker
Tabletop-Pick-Apple-v1: pick the apple to the marker
Tabletop-Pick-Cube-ToHolder-v1: pick up the cube, put it in the holder
Tabletop-Rotate-USB-v1: Rotate the USB body for 90 degree with plug right ward
Tabletop-Put-Fork-OnPlate-v1: put the fork on the plate
